AYSEC ORDER NO: 02/2014

Subject: Exemption from pre-embarkation security checks at Civil Airports

Reference AVSEC Order No. 06/2009 dated 04/11/2009 and AVSEC Order No. —
01/2014, it has been decided to restore the exemption available to the Ambassador of
‘Thailand to India from frisking at all civil airports in Indi

2. This order supersedes the AVSEC Order 01/2014 dated 07/02/2014.
